document.heading: Day Care Policy Act Amendment Act of 1980

history.narrative: Law 3-166, the “Day Care Policy Act Amendment Act of 1980,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-381, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 28, 1980, and November 12, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 25, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-297 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
